verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> [O] <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of a father, And <S%H1>give<s%> <S%H7181>attention<s%> that you may <S%H7181>gain<s%> <S%H3045>understanding,<s%>
For I <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H2896>sound<s%> <S%H3948>teaching;<s%> Do not <S%H5800>abandon<s%> my <S%H8451>instruction.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> I was a <S%H1121>son<s%> to my father, <S%H1>Tender<s%> and the <S%H7390>only<s%> <S%H3173>son<s%> in the <S%H3173>sight<s%> of my <S%H6440>mother,<s%>

Then he <S%H3384>taught<s%> me and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> <S%H8551>fast<s%> my <S%H1697>words;<s%> <S%H8104>Keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and <S%H2421>live;<s%>

<S%H7069>Acquire<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom!<s%> <S%H7069>Acquire<s%> <S%H998>understanding!<s%> Do not <S%H7911>forget,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>away<s%> from the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
"Do not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> her, and she will <S%H8104>guard<s%> you; <S%H157>Love<s%> her, and she will <S%H5341>watch<s%> over you.
"The <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> [is: ] <S%H7069>Acquire<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> And with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7075>acquiring,<s%> <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
<S%H5549>"Prize<s%> her, and she will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> you; She will <S%H3513>honor<s%> you <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H2263>embrace<s%> her.
"She will <S%H5414>place<s%> on your <S%H7218>head<s%> a <S%H3880>garland<s%> of <S%H2580>grace;<s%> She will <S%H4042>present<s%> you with a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>beauty.<s%>"
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3947>accept<s%> my <S%H561>sayings,<s%> And the <S%H8141>years<s%> of your <S%H9132>life<s%> will be <S%H7235>many.<s%>
I have <S%H3384>directed<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> I have <S%H1869>led<s%> you in <S%H3476>upright<s%> <S%H4570>paths.<s%>
When you <S%H1980>walk,<s%> your <S%H6806>steps<s%> will not be <S%H9503>impeded;<s%> And <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7323>run,<s%> you will not <S%H3782>stumble.<s%>
<S%H2388>Take<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction;<s%> do not <S%H7503>let<s%> <S%H7503>go.<s%> <S%H5341>Guard<s%> her, for she is your <S%H9132>life.<s%>
Do not <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> And do not <S%H833>proceed<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>men.<s%>
<S%H6544>Avoid<s%> it, do not <S%H5674>pass<s%> by it; <S%H7847>Turn<s%> <S%H7847>away<s%> from it and <S%H5674>pass<s%> on.

For they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3462>sleep<s%> <S%H518>unless<s%> <S%H3808><s%> they <S%H7489>do<s%> <S%H7489>evil;<s%> And they are <S%H1497>robbed<s%> of <S%H8142>sleep<s%> <S%H518>unless<s%> <S%H3808><s%> they make [someone] <S%H3782>stumble.<s%>
For they <S%H9237>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> And <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

But the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is like the <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H5051>dawn,<s%> That <S%H215>shines<s%> <S%H1980>brighter<s%> and <S%H1980>brighter<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3559>full<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is like <S%H653>darkness;<s%> They do not <S%H3045>know<s%> over <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H3782>stumble.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7181>give<s%> <S%H7181>attention<s%> to my <S%H561>words;<s%> <S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H561>sayings.<s%>
Do not let them <S%H3868>depart<s%> from your <S%H5869>sight;<s%> <S%H8104>Keep<s%> them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
For they are <S%H9132>life<s%> to those who <S%H4672>find<s%> them, And <S%H4832>health<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1320>body.<s%>
<S%H5341>Watch<s%> over your <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4929>diligence,<s%> For from it [flow] the <S%H8444>springs<s%> of <S%H9132>life.<s%>
<S%H5493>Put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from you a <S%H6143>deceitful<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And <S%H7368>put<s%> <S%H3891>devious<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from you.
Let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H5227>directly<s%> <S%H5227>ahead,<s%> And let your <S%H6079>gaze<s%> be <S%H3474>fixed<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%> in <S%H5048>front<s%> of you.
<S%H6424>Watch<s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> will be <S%H3559>established.<s%>
Do not <S%H5186>turn<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> to the <S%H8040>left;<s%> <S%H5493>Turn<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from <S%H9563>evil.<s%>
